main event: A round, bright blue object was observed zigzagging out of sight in Makanda, Illinois on 9 November 1957.
interesting points: The object was classified as possibly a balloon or satellite by the observer., The sighting lasted for 13 minutes., The observer noted that the object had no tail or appurtenances., The object zigzagged before disappearing from view., The report emphasizes that additional information is very limited and only a visual sighting was made.
